message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a bit more, but it's my turn to propose.  Let's settle this quickly.
You wanted to settle quickly, but I need a better deal
This is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
Even split is not enough, considering the inflation on your side
Okay, I'm willing to accept a smaller share, but this needs to be reasonable.  This is my final offer.
Your 'final offer' wasn't final enough, it seems
I'm serious, Alice. We're wasting time here.  Take this offer or let's walk away with nothing.
I'll take a bigger share, since you're not budging
